ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The AGI/AC debuff is pretty significant, as well.  Between the 45 AGI debuff and the AC debuff, I dropped my AC by 62 points when I managed to stick this
ygData.messageBody:
>The movement slowdown is less than that of chains, I found while weaving
>it with screech. It's more along the lines of the spell snare.

The AGI/AC debuff is pretty significant, as well. Between the 45 AGI debuff
and the AC debuff, I dropped my AC by 62 points when I managed to stick this
on myself. My only concern in using this would be if the attack speed
component overwrote that of a shammie or enchanter (assuming they cast their
spell first). Has anyone had a chance to test this yet? (I imagine no
one -- including myself -- is in too much of a "testing" mentality right
now, with so much new territory to explore, heh.)

Raiel
